section.programlisting: 00236 def do_POST(self): 00237 """Serve a POST request.""" 00238 try: 00239 length = self.headers.getheader('content-length') or "0" 00240 try: 00241 length = int(length) 00242 except: 00243 length = 0 00244 content = self.rfile.read(length) 00245 fields = parse_query(content) 00246 f = self.send_head(fields) 00247 if f: 00248 self.copyfile(f, self.wfile) 00249 f.close() 00250 except Exception as e: 00251 self.handle_exception(e) 00252

section.title: get_report_context()
section.para: Definition at line 441 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00441 def get_report_context(self, report): 00442 class Context(object): 00443 pass 00444 if report is None or report == 'None': 00445 data = self.load_crashes() 00446 # Don't allow empty reports. 00447 if not data: 00448 raise ValueError('No crashes detected!') 00449 c = Context() 00450 c.title = 'clang static analyzer failures' 00451 00452 stderrSummary = "" 00453 for item in data: 00454 if 'stderr' in item: 00455 path = posixpath.join(self.server.root, item['stderr']) 00456 if os.path.exists(path): 00457 lns = itertools.islice(open(path), 0, 10) 00458 stderrSummary += '%s\n--\n%s' % (item.get('src', 00459 ''), 00460 ''.join(lns)) 00461 00462 c.description = """\ 00463 The clang static analyzer failed on these inputs: 00464 %s 00465 00466 STDERR Summary 00467 -------------- 00468 %s 00469 """ % ('\n'.join([item.get('src','') for item in data]), 00470 stderrSummary) 00471 c.reportSource = None 00472 c.navMarkup = "Report Crashes > " 00473 c.files = [] 00474 for item in data: 00475 c.files.append(item.get('src','')) 00476 c.files.append(posixpath.join(self.server.root, 00477 item.get('file',''))) 00478 c.files.append(posixpath.join(self.server.root, 00479 item.get('clangfile',''))) 00480 c.files.append(posixpath.join(self.server.root, 00481 item.get('stderr',''))) 00482 c.files.append(posixpath.join(self.server.root, 00483 item.get('info',''))) 00484 # Just in case something failed, ignore files which don't 00485 # exist. 00486 c.files = [f for f in c.files 00487 if os.path.exists(f) and os.path.isfile(f)] 00488 else: 00489 # Check that this is a valid report. 00490 path = posixpath.join(self.server.root, 'report-%s.html' % report) 00491 if not posixpath.exists(path): 00492 raise ValueError('Invalid report ID') 00493 keys = self.load_report(report) 00494 c = Context() 00495 c.title = keys.get('DESC','clang error (unrecognized') 00496 c.description = """\ 00497 Bug reported by the clang static analyzer. 00498 00499 Description: %s 00500 File: %s 00501 Line: %s 00502 """%(c.title, keys.get('FILE',''), keys.get('LINE', '')) 00503 c.reportSource = 'report-%s.html' % report 00504 c.navMarkup = """Report %s > """ % (c.reportSource, 00505 report) 00506 00507 c.files = [path] 00508 return c 00509

section.para: Definition at line 281 of file ScanView.py.

section.title: load_crashes()
section.para: Definition at line 270 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00270 def load_crashes(self): 00271 path = posixpath.join(self.server.root, 'index.html') 00272 data = open(path).read() 00273 problems = [] 00274 for item in kReportCrashEntryRE.finditer(data): 00275 fieldData = item.group(1) 00276 fields = dict([i.groups() for i in 00277 kReportCrashEntryKeyValueRE.finditer(fieldData)]) 00278 problems.append(fields) 00279 return problems 00280

section.title: send_file()
section.para: Definition at line 736 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00736 def send_file(self, f, ctype): 00737 # Patch files to add links, but skip binary files. 00738 self.send_response(200) 00739 self.send_header("Content-type", ctype) 00740 fs = os.fstat(f.fileno()) 00741 self.send_header("Content-Length", str(fs[6])) 00742 self.send_header("Last-Modified", self.date_time_string(fs.st_mtime)) 00743 self.end_headers() 00744 return f 00745

section.title: send_head()
section.para: Definition at line 658 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00658 def send_head(self, fields=None): 00659 if (self.server.options.onlyServeLocal and 00660 self.client_address[0] != '127.0.0.1'): 00661 return self.send_error(401, 'Unauthorized host.') 00662 00663 if fields is None: 00664 fields = {} 00665 self.fields = fields 00666 00667 o = urlparse(self.path) 00668 self.fields = parse_query(o.query, fields) 00669 path = posixpath.normpath(unquote(o.path)) 00670 00671 # Split the components and strip the root prefix. 00672 components = path.split('/')[1:] 00673 00674 # Special case some top-level entries. 00675 if components: 00676 name = components[0] 00677 if len(components)==2: 00678 if name=='report': 00679 return self.send_report(components[1]) 00680 elif name=='open': 00681 return self.send_open_report(components[1]) 00682 elif len(components)==1: 00683 if name=='quit': 00684 self.server.halt() 00685 return self.send_string('Goodbye.', 'text/plain') 00686 elif name=='report_submit': 00687 return self.send_report_submit() 00688 elif name=='report_crashes': 00689 overrides = { 'ScanView' : {}, 00690 'Radar' : {}, 00691 'Email' : {} } 00692 for i,r in enumerate(self.server.reporters): 00693 if r.getName() == 'Radar': 00694 overrides['ScanView']['reporter'] = i 00695 break 00696 overrides['Radar']['Component'] = 'llvm - checker' 00697 overrides['Radar']['Component Version'] = 'X' 00698 return self.send_report(None, overrides) 00699 elif name=='favicon.ico': 00700 return self.send_path(posixpath.join(kShare,'bugcatcher.ico')) 00701 00702 # Match directory entries. 00703 if components[-1] == '': 00704 components[-1] = 'index.html' 00705 00706 relpath = '/'.join(components) 00707 path = posixpath.join(self.server.root, relpath) 00708 00709 if self.server.options.debug > 1: 00710 print('%s: SERVER: sending path "%s"'%(sys.argv[0], 00711 path), file=sys.stderr) 00712 return self.send_path(path) 00713

section.title: send_open_report()
section.para: Definition at line 418 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00418 def send_open_report(self, report): 00419 try: 00420 keys = self.load_report(report) 00421 except IOError: 00422 return self.send_error(400, 'Invalid report.') 00423 00424 file = keys.get('FILE') 00425 if not file or not posixpath.exists(file): 00426 return self.send_error(400, 'File does not exist: "%s"' % file) 00427 00428 import startfile 00429 if self.server.options.debug: 00430 print('%s: SERVER: opening "%s"'%(sys.argv[0], 00431 file), file=sys.stderr) 00432 00433 status = startfile.open(file) 00434 if status: 00435 res = 'Opened: "%s"' % file 00436 else: 00437 res = 'Open failed: "%s"' % file 00438 00439 return self.send_string(res, 'text/plain') 00440

section.title: send_patched_file()
section.para: Definition at line 758 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00758 def send_patched_file(self, path, ctype): 00759 # Allow a very limited set of variables. This is pretty gross. 00760 variables = {} 00761 variables['report'] = '' 00762 m = kReportFileRE.match(path) 00763 if m: 00764 variables['report'] = m.group(2) 00765 00766 try: 00767 f = open(path,'rb') 00768 except IOError: 00769 return self.send_404() 00770 fs = os.fstat(f.fileno()) 00771 data = f.read().decode('utf-8') 00772 for a,b in kReportReplacements: 00773 data = a.sub(b % variables, data) 00774 return self.send_string(data, ctype, mtime=fs.st_mtime) 00775 00776

section.title: send_path()
section.para: Definition at line 718 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00718 def send_path(self, path): 00719 # If the requested path is outside the root directory, do not open it 00720 rel = os.path.abspath(path) 00721 if not rel.startswith(os.path.abspath(self.server.root)): 00722 return self.send_404() 00723 00724 ctype = self.guess_type(path) 00725 if ctype.startswith('text/'): 00726 # Patch file instead 00727 return self.send_patched_file(path, ctype) 00728 else: 00729 mode = 'rb' 00730 try: 00731 f = open(path, mode) 00732 except IOError: 00733 return self.send_404() 00734 return self.send_file(f, ctype) 00735

section.title: send_string()

para.computeroutput: def ScanView.ScanViewRequestHandler.send_string ( self, s, ctype = 'text/html' , headers = True , mtime = None )

section.para: Definition at line 746 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00746 def send_string(self, s, ctype='text/html', headers=True, mtime=None): 00747 encoded_s = s.encode('utf-8') 00748 if headers: 00749 self.send_response(200) 00750 self.send_header("Content-type", ctype) 00751 self.send_header("Content-Length", str(len(encoded_s))) 00752 if mtime is None: 00753 mtime = self.dynamic_mtime 00754 self.send_header("Last-Modified", self.date_time_string(mtime)) 00755 self.end_headers() 00756 return BytesIO(encoded_s) 00757

section.title: submit_bug()
section.para: Definition at line 297 of file ScanView.py.
section.programlisting: 00297 def submit_bug(self, c): 00298 title = self.get_scalar_field('title') 00299 description = self.get_scalar_field('description') 00300 report = self.get_scalar_field('report') 00301 reporterIndex = self.get_scalar_field('reporter') 00302 files = [] 00303 for fileID in self.fields.get('files',[]): 00304 try: 00305 i = int(fileID) 00306 except: 00307 i = None 00308 if i is None or i<0 or i>=len(c.files): 00309 return (False, 'Invalid file ID') 00310 files.append(c.files[i]) 00311 00312 if not title: 00313 return (False, "Missing title.") 00314 if not description: 00315 return (False, "Missing description.") 00316 try: 00317 reporterIndex = int(reporterIndex) 00318 except: 00319 return (False, "Invalid report method.") 00320 00321 # Get the reporter and parameters. 00322 reporter = self.server.reporters[reporterIndex] 00323 parameters = {} 00324 for o in reporter.getParameters(): 00325 name = '%s_%s'%(reporter.getName(),o.getName()) 00326 if name not in self.fields: 00327 return (False, 00328 'Missing field "%s" for %s report method.'%(name, 00329 reporter.getName())) 00330 parameters[o.getName()] = self.get_scalar_field(name) 00331 00332 # Update config defaults. 00333 if report != 'None': 00334 self.server.config.set('ScanView', 'reporter', reporterIndex) 00335 for o in reporter.getParameters(): 00336 if o.saveConfigValue(): 00337 name = o.getName() 00338 self.server.config.set(reporter.getName(), name, parameters[name]) 00339 00340 # Create the report. 00341 bug = Reporter.BugReport(title, description, files) 00342 00343 # Kick off a reporting thread. 00344 t = ReporterThread(bug, reporter, parameters, self.server) 00345 t.start() 00346 00347 # Wait for thread to die... 00348 while t.isAlive(): 00349 time.sleep(.25) 00350 submitStatus = t.status 00351 00352 return (t.success, t.status) 00353
